about_the_game:
Welcome to WonderLang, where mastering German transforms into an engaging RPG journey. Immerse yourself in captivating quests, interactive dialogues, and fun puzzles designed to make language learning seamless and enjoyable.

WonderLang weaves language into the core of its adventure and compelling narrative. Get immersed in Wonderlang, as you: Explore, Fight, Converse and Investigate using your target language.

More affordable, more engaging, and way more fun than any subscription-based language learning app!

WonderLang is designed for beginner language learners, allowing you to dive into the game without any prior knowledge of the language. While the game doesn't aim to fully replace traditional language courses, it provides an immersive and enjoyable way to practice a new language gradually.

Key Features

  • Immersive German Learning

    • Learn practical German through every conversation, quest, and puzzle.

    • Progress through beginner level A1 with 40 to 50 hours of combined learning and gameplay.

                                                               

  • Engaging Storyline

    • Follow the journey of a young hero who must learn German to lift a magical curse from their brother.

    • Explore vibrant villages, uncover secrets, and build friendships interracting with over 60 unique NPCs.

  • Learning as a Gameplay Mechanic

    • Solve puzzles, and complete quests by forming sentences and understanding dialogues.

    • Practice building sentences and pronunciation thanks to speech recognition challenges.

    • Utilize in-game tools like a dictionary and contextual help to aid your learning.

                                                             

  • Spaced Repetition Combat Challenges

    • Engage in language-based combat to reinforce language retention.

    • Combat challenges are designed using the spaced repetition principle

  • Real-World Context Practice

    • Apply your German skills in everyday scenarios such as buying groceries or making an appointment at the doctor.

    • Experience practical vocabulary and grammar in real-world contexts to enhance your language proficiency.

                                                         

  • Customizable Learning Experience

    • Customize your learning journey with various difficulty settings to make the experience more or less challenging based on your preference.

    • Set daily goals and earn rewards for reaching them, helping you build a consistent learning routine.

  • Rich Interactive World

    • Explore exotic locations, each introducing specific German vocabulary and grammar rules.

    • Participate in mini-games like crosswords, memory games, and charades to diversify your learning experience.

Welcome to WonderLang, where mastering German transforms into an engaging RPG journey. Immerse yourself in captivating quests, interactive dialogues, and fun puzzles designed to make language learning seamless and enjoyable.

WonderLang weaves language into the core of its adventure and compelling narrative. Get immersed in Wonderlang, as you: Explore, Fight, Converse and Investigate using your target language.

WonderLang is designed for beginner language learners, allowing you to dive into the game without any prior knowledge of the language. While the game doesn't aim to fully replace traditional language courses, it provides an immersive and enjoyable way to practice a new language gradually.

Key Features

  • Immersive German Learning

    • Learn practical German through every conversation, quest, and puzzle.

    • Progress through beginner level A1 with 40 to 50 hours of combined learning and gameplay.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: Mac OS 11.00 or better
  • Processor: Apple M1 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Required
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: WonderLang German

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows® 8.1/10/11 (64bit)
  • Graphics: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Required
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

short_description: Learn German through immersive quests, interactive dialogues, and spaced repetition combat challenges. Help a young hero lift a magical curse by mastering German. Customize your learning experience and explore a vibrant world filled with unique characters. Start your journey to German fluency today!
